channel.title: Lisp Metacircular on Enrico's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Lisp Metacircular on Enrico's Blog

item.title: metacircularity
item.description: I found and liked a very good summary of the ‘Maxwell Equations of software’ motto from Alan Kay in this post from Michael Nielsen. It is nice also because it has running code inspired by all the gurus and books I like: Alan Kay, Peter Norvig, John McCarthy, SICP, Paul Graham.
